Name: ARENIX
About the game: Arenix is a brutal fast-paced top-down shooter with thousands of monsters and even more bullets. Moving all the time is your only chance to survive. Stop for a moment and you're dead. Death is inevitable, but how long can you survive? • Endless mayhem • Different types of enemies • Original soundtrack • And just a lot of GUNS GUNS GUNS

Meta Description: Looking for information on ARENIX? Check out the release date (Dec 30, 2020), developer insights from Volens Games, and a complete game summary.
